google_translated: When your tears spill in a sadness

en_text: Whenever your heart floods with loneliness and you waste away,
jp_text: 寂しさに溢れて心がしぼんでく時
google_translated: When the heart is full of loneliness

en_text: Just as you once called out mine.
jp_text: 僕の名前を呼んでくれたみたいに
google_translated: It seems like I called my name

en_text: this notebook has everything in life  written out in exacting detail.
jp_text: 実に細々と人生計画の凡てを書いてあるこの手帳は
google_translated: This notebook is written in the middle of life plans

jp_text: 次回　「文豪ストレイドッグス」第六話
